page.title: 11WARDOUR SCHOOL TODAY
page.content: {Wardour School}is a{Catholic {Primary School.}We go to{Mass}on Fridays to{Wardour Chapel.}There are sixty two pupils in this school. We have three classes. The children do quite a lot of exciting things,for instance{cookery. We make things like cakes,biscuits and chutney.We do games which most schools do,such as{rounders,netball,cricket and{football.}One unusual thing we do is{gardening}and looking after{school {goats.}This is quite exciting as we feed them and muck them out. Of course we do ordinary lessons like{Maths, {English}and{Geography.}We like this school very much. Another thing that the{girls} do is{country dancing which we do instead of games on rainy days.and which can lead to{public { displays. {Jennifer Laura N.
